attributes.action: Include a ban on ritual slaughter of animals for Halal and Kosher food
attributes.additional_details: The Government is proposing several measures to protect animals from undue suffering; I believe the Halal and Kosher ritual slaughter for food of animals is abhorrent and offends the majority of people.
attributes.background: I want the Government to include in its animal cruelty Bill the prohibition of ritual slaughter of animals for Halal and Kosher food.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban the non-stun slaughter of animals
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729708
